item.title: Product Videography - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for some product videography for a product we want to sell on our online store. We would ship it out to you so that you can help us get some video footage of the product.

You don't have to be in the video, you just have to get video footage of the product.

Here is the product that we need video footage of from different angles.

https://www.aliexpress.us/item/3256806862887454.html

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 20, 2024 11:58 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production
Skills: Videography, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
